infotexts.talentdescription.emergencyresponsenew: You move [movementspeed]% faster and take [damagereduction]% less damage if any crew member is unconscious.
infotexts.experiencetooltipold: Experience is primarily gained by completing missions.\nCompleting missions in a more difficult area rewards more experience.
infotexts.talentname.handsomestrangerold: Once Upon a Time on Europa
infotexts.talentdescription.tumbleold: Whenever you ragdoll for at least [seconds] seconds, your attacks with pistols are [damage]% more powerful for the next [duration] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.cigarsmoked: Gain [number]% firerate after smoking a cigar for a few seconds.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.cigar: Ready to lay down some suppressing fire \n(only works with sailor with no name)
infotexts.talentdescription.quickdrawold: If it has been longer than [seconds] seconds since you've attacked with a pistol, your next attack with a pistol is [damage]% more powerful.
infotexts.talentdescription.evasivemaneuversold: Whenever your submarine takes damage from a monster, gain a bonus of [helmbonus] to the Helm skill for [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.evasivemaneuversol: The subject has momentarily become a much better captain.
infotexts.talentdescription.bountyhunterold: Whenever you or an allied crewmember kills a monster, your crew gains additional marks equal to [percentage]% of the creature's maximum health.
infotexts.talentdescription.trustedcaptainold: Whenever you finish at least one mission, gain a Coalition Commendation.\nWhen you apply a Coalition Commendation on another character, they gain [targetxpgain] experience, and you gain [selfxpgain] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.esteemedcaptainold: Whenever you finish at least one mission, gain a Coalition Medal.\nWhen you apply a Coalition Medal on another character, gain [selfxpgain] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.figureheadnew: Whenever you finish at least one mission, gain a Coalition Medal.\nWhen you apply a Coalition Medal on another character, they gain [targetxpgain] experience, and you gain [selfxpgain] experience. If the target character is then below level [level], give them XP to reach level 5.\nAll services on affiliated outposts give [discount]% discount.
infotexts.talentdescription.downwiththeshipold: If you are on your submarine and it becomes at least [flooded]% flooded, you gain an additional [swimmingboost]% swimming speed and a bonus of [skillboost] to Mechanical and Electrical skills for [duration] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.camaraderieold: Whenever you finish a mission without a crewmember dying, and your crew contains at least [jobcount] different jobs, your crew gains an additional [extramoney]% money and experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.drunkensailorold: Gain [dmgresistance]% physical damage resistance and [stunresistance]% stun resistance while drunk.\nWhen you play a Harmonica, a random ally on your current submarine has a [skillgainprobability]% chance to gain a random skill point every second.
infotexts.talentdescription.steadytune2: When you play a Harmonica, a random ally on your current submarine has a [skillgainprobability]% chance to gain a random skill point every second.
infotexts.talentdescription.drunkensailornew: Gain [dmgresistance]% physical damage resistance and [stunresistance]% stun resistance while drunk and immunity to the negative effects of drunkenness.
infotexts.talentdescription.truckerold: Whenever you finish all your selected missions, gain an additional Coalition Commendation.
infotexts.talentdescription.trustbuildingold: Whenever you finish a mission, your crew gains an additional [smallgain]% maximum health, and if all crewmembers survived, your crew gains an additional [largegain]% maximum health instead, up to a maximum of [maxgain]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.bythebookold: Whenever you finish at least one mission, your crew gains an additional [moneyamount] marks and [experienceamount] experience for each captured, live enemy human on board your ship, up to a maximum of [moneyamountmax] marks and [experienceamountmax] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.bootcampold: Whenever you finish a mission without a crewmember dying, you gain an additional [amount]% experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.tandemfireold: As long as you are manning a turret alongside another allied crewmember, both of your attacks are [amount]% more powerful. Only the closest allied crewmember gains this effect.
infotexts.talentdescription.munitionsexpertiseold: Whenever you fabricate SMG ammo, shotgun ammo or stun gun ammo, you have a [probability]% chance to gain twice as much output.
infotexts.talentdescription.multitaskerold: Whenever you gain a skill point, if it’s not for the same skill as the last skill point gained, gain an additional skill point.
infotexts.talentdescription.apprenticeshipold: Whenever another allied character gains a skill point, you have a [probability]% chance to also gain a skill point in that skill.
infotexts.talentdescription.buccaneerold: Aiming with a melee weapon before attacking adds up to [amount]% power to your next melee attack.
infotexts.talentdescription.crisismanagementold: The more filled with water your submarine is, the faster you repair the hull and swim, up to an additional [statamount1]% hull repair speed and [statamount2]% swimming speed.
infotexts.talentdescription.cannotfallunconsciousf: Whenever you fall below 0 health, you will remain fully conscious and your attacks are [powerincrease]% more powerful for [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainmedicalskillformis: Whenever you complete a mission, if all crewmembers survived, gain [skillincrease] points in Medical skill.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainoutputandskillfrom: Whenever you deconstruct an alien artifact, you have a [probability]% chance to gain double output from it and gain [largeartifactskill] to a random skill. Small alien artifacts, when deconstructed, give [smallartifactskill] skill instead.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainexperiencefromarti: Whenever you deconstruct an alien artifact, you and another random allied crewmember gains [experiencegain] experience. Small alien artifacts, when deconstructed, give [smallexperiencegain] experience instead.
infotexts.talentdescription.maxtriggeruntildeathol: This effect can only occur once per life each round.
infotexts.talentdescription.maxskillfromtalentold: This talent can only give up to [skillamount] skill bonus.
infotexts.talentdescription.expertcommandoold: When firing a ranged weapon while crouched, you gain [spreadreduction]% reduction to spread and your attacks are [powerincrease]% more powerful, but your firing rate is [firingratedecrease]% slower.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainmedicalitemeffecti: Medical items you apply are [amount]% more potent.
infotexts.talentdescription.geneticmaterialrefinef: Refining genetic materials adds an additional [amount]% to their potency.
infotexts.talentdescription.stillkickinghealold: Whenever you fall below 0 health, rapidly heal normal damage types and remove stun over a short duration.
Whenever you fall below 0 health, rapidly heal normal damage types and remove stun over a short duration.
infotexts.talentdescription.extraskillfromcrafting: Gain [amount]% more skill from fabricating items.
infotexts.talentdescription.medicaleffectivenessol: Medical items are [amount]% more potent when applied to you.
infotexts.talentdescription.payextra.monsterandnes: You are paid an additional [extra]% for monster and nest missions.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.fabricatorandde: You can tinker with a fabricator or a deconstructor, increasing their operating rate by [speedincrease]%.\nYou can tinker with fabricators and deconstructors indefinitely.
infotexts.talentdescription.honkinggivesskillgaino: Clown Power allows you to honk your horn to give nearby allies an additional [skillgainincrease]% skill gain for a short while.
infotexts.talentdescription.honkinghealscharacters: Clown Power allows you to honk your horn to slowly heal nearby allies.
infotexts.talentdescription.standanddeliverold: Whenever you finish at least one mission, gain 'The Sailor's Guide'.\nWhenever you use 'The Sailor's Guide', the ally nearest to you gains [skillamount] to all skills.
infotexts.talentdescription.letitdrainreminderold: You can only install a maximum of [itemcount] of this item on your submarine.
infotexts.talentdescription.cannedheatold: Whenever you play an accordion, the ally nearest to you will gain [allyexperienceamount] experience every second. When they do, you gain [experienceamount] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.nuclearoptionold: When you fabricate a fuel rod, gain triple output.
infotexts.talentdescription.doublefabricate: When you fabricate ammo, gain double output.
infotexts.talentdescription.quickfixold: Whenever you fully repair a device, gain [experienceamount] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.maxtriggeruntildeathol: This effect can only occur once per life.
infotexts.talentdescription.maxtriggeruntilmission: This effect can only occur up to [maxtrigger] times until you finish another mission.
infotexts.talentdescription.singletriggeruntilmiss: This effect cannot occur again until you finish another mission.
infotexts.talentdescription.increaseattackpowertom: Your attacks are [attackpowerincrease]% more powerful against monsters inside your submarine.
infotexts.talentdescription.cannotfallunconsciouso: You will remain fully conscious even after falling below 0 health.
infotexts.talentdescription.extramarksonnewstation: Your crew gains an additional [marks] marks whenever you reach a new station.
infotexts.talentdescription.bonuseslostondeathold: These bonuses are lost on death.
infotexts.talentdescription.bonuslostondeathold: This bonus is lost on death.
infotexts.talentdescription.assistantsdontcountold: The deaths of assistants do not count.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainitemonfinishmissio: Whenever you finish a mission without a crewmember dying, gain the item [item]
infotexts.talentdescription.maximumhealthperlevelo: Gain an additional [maximumhealth]% maximum health for each of your levels.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainalltalentsintreeol: Gain all the talents in this talent tree.
infotexts.talentdescription.bedsidemannerold: Whenever you apply medicine to a friendly character, they gain [physicaldamageresistance] physical damage resistance and an additional [skillgainincrease]% skill gain, the total duration depending on your medical skill.
infotexts.talentdescription.electrochemistold: If you have not been attacked for [seconds] seconds, the next attack you suffer has [powerreduction]% less power and your attacker is stunned for [stunseconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.drsubmarineold: Boost regeneration of NearbyCharacters from bleeding by [selfinflictpercentage].
infotexts.talentdescription.combatmedicold: Gain an additional percentage to Movement Speed, Ranged Fire Rate and Melee Attack Speed equal to [skillpercentage]% of your medical skill.
infotexts.talentdescription.geneharvesterold: When you or another crewmember kills a monster while outside your submarine, you have a [probability]% chance of finding a random genetic material on it.
infotexts.talentdescription.researchgrantold: Whenever you refine or combine genetic items, gain [marks] marks.
infotexts.talentdescription.melodicrespiteold: When you play a guitar, you and allies near you gain the following attributes for up to [seconds] seconds:
infotexts.talentdescription.expandedresearchold: Whenever you fabricate depleted fuel or a fuel rod, gain [experienceamount] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.hazardousmaterialsold: Whenever you loot a reactor in a wreck for the first time, you will find rare materials.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainskillatlowskillold: When you gain a skill point for a skill that has a total lower than [skilltotal], gain an additional skill point.
infotexts.talentdescription.advancedsplicingold: Whenever you or another allied crewmember combines or refines genetic materials, gain [experienceamount] experience and a bonus of [skillbonus] to medical.
infotexts.talentdescription.increasemaxrepairelect: As long as your electrical skill is [skilltotal] or higher, you can repair electrical devices [percentage]% past their maximum condition.
infotexts.talentdescription.dontdieonmeold: The CPR you apply is much more powerful.
infotexts.talentdescription.healabovehealthold: As long as you are above [percentage]% health, normal damage types slowly heal by themselves.
infotexts.talentdescription.extraskillfromcrafting: Gain [amount]% more [skillname] skill from fabricating items.
infotexts.talentdescription.scavengerold: Whenever you open a container outside your submarine for the first time, you have a [probability]% chance of finding additional items.
infotexts.talentdescription.payextra.cargoandescor: You are paid an additional [extra]% for cargo and escort missions.
infotexts.talentdescription.simultaneousskillgaino: Whenever you gain [skillname1] skill, also gain [skillname2] skill.
infotexts.talentdescription.increasereputationgain: Your crew's reputation gains are improved by [value]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.chanceofextraweapondam: Whenever you attack with any weapon, your attack has a [probability]% chance of becoming twice as powerful.
infotexts.talentdescription.extrapowertoharpoonsol: Gain an additional [value]% attack power to harpoons.
infotexts.talentdescription.extrapowertoharpoonsin: If you are in the open sea, gain an additional [value]% attack power to harpoons instead.
infotexts.talentdescription.dropalienmaterialonkil: When you kill a monster while outside your submarine, it has a [probability]% chance of having an additional alien material.
infotexts.talentdescription.warriorpoetold: You can write a book.\nTo do this, ragdoll yourself. After [seconds] seconds, you will gain the item [itemname] and [moneyamount] marks for each enemy you've killed since your last book (as royalties).
infotexts.talentdescription.dualspecopsold: When you ragdoll in water, propel yourself forward in your current direction.
infotexts.talentdescription.beatcopold: You can tackle other characters by ragdolling into them at high speeds.
infotexts.talentdescription.truepotentialold: Clown Power allows you to hit characters with a Toy Hammer for a [probability]% chance to implode them.
infotexts.talentdescription.stonewallold: Whenever you are attacked, gain an additional [physicaldamagereduction]% physical damage resistance and [stunresistance]% stun resistance for [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.richinknowledgeold: Whenever you gain a skill point, gain an additional [experienceamount] experience, while your allied crewmembers gain [alliedexperienceamount] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.olympianold: You gain an additional percentage to the following attributes equal to [skillpercentage] of the total average of all your skills:
infotexts.talentdescription.playingcatchupold: If you are [levelvalue] or more levels behind your most highest-leveled crewmember, gain an additional [experiencevalue]% mission experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.skedaddleold: Move [value]% faster. When you are attacked, this bonus is increased to [attackedvalue]% for [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.insurancepolicynew: Whenever you die from non-friendly sources during a mission, your crew is paid [amount] marks for each mission you've completed since the last time you've died.\nGain [amount2]% resistance to Reaper's Tax.
infotexts.talentdescription.feigndeathold: Enemies will ignore you if you have been ragdolled for longer than [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.stillkickingold: Whenever you fall unconscious, revive a short while later and remove all afflictions.
infotexts.talentdescription.crewlayaboutold: Allies near you repair [repairspeed]% faster and gain a bonus of [amount] to all skills.
infotexts.talentdescription.graduationceremonyold: Upon creating a new character, retain all of your current experience for that new character.
infotexts.talentdescription.enrollintoclowncollege: As long as you are wearing a full clown outfit, you gain Clown Power.
infotexts.talentdescription.clownpowerdamagereduct: Clown Power gives you an additional [physicalresistance]% physical damage resistance.
infotexts.talentdescription.waterpranksterold: Clown Power gives you immunity to pressure and allows you to swim [swimspeedvalue]% faster.
infotexts.talentdescription.inspiringtunesold: Clown Power allows you to honk your horn to repair nearby electrical and mechanical items, and nearby allies to gain a bonus of [skillamount] to all skills for a short while.
infotexts.talentdescription.psychoclownold: Clown Power allows you to attack faster with melee weapons based on how much Psychosis you have, up to [maxattackspeed]%, but you cannot run while having Psychosis.
infotexts.talentdescription.slapstickexpertold: Clown Power allows you to have a small chance to trip randomly when you run.\nWhile ragdolled, Clown Power allows you to reduce the power of incoming attacks by [powerreduction]%, and characters that attack you have a [probability]% chance of becoming stunned for [stunseconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.commandoold: When firing a ranged weapon while crouched, gain [armorpenetration]% additional armor penetration, and your attacks are [powerincrease]% more powerful, but your firing rate is [firingratedecrease]% slower.\nRecover from bleeding much more quickly.
infotexts.talentdescription.phdinnuclearphysicsold: Your attacks with crowbars are [powerincrease]% more powerful.
infotexts.talentdescription.intheflowold: Gain [amount]% swim speed.\nWhenever you fully repair a device, repair [repairspeed]% faster for the next [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.coauthorold: You can co-write a book with a Mechanic.\nTo do this, select their character and have them select yours. After [seconds] seconds, you will gain [itemname], and both of you gain [experienceamount] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.polymathold: Gain a bonus of [skillincrease] to all skills, and you gain [experiencegain]% more mission experience, but you have [maximumhealthreduction]% less maximum health.
infotexts.talentdescription.optimizedpowerflowold: Gain an additional percentage to Turret Power Cost Reduction and Turret Charge Speed equal to [statamount]% of your Electrical skill.\nWhenever you fully repair an item, gain a bonus of [skillamount] to Electrical.
infotexts.talentdescription.aggressiveengineeringo: When you attack with a wrench, you have a [probability]% chance to attack with [powerincrease]% additional power and inflict an additional stun.
infotexts.talentdescription.pyromaniacold: When you inflict burning damage on an enemy, gain [physicaldamagereduction]% physical damage resistance for [seconds] seconds.\nInflict [burnincrease]% more burning damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.scrapsavantold: You can refine [scrapamount] scrap to any alien material.\nGain [experienceamount] experience when you fabricate an alien material.
infotexts.talentdescription.scroungerold: When you deconstruct scrap, gain [experienceamount] experience and a bonus of [skillamount] to mechanical.
infotexts.talentdescription.elbowgreaseold: Gain an additional percentage to Melee Power and Maximum Health equal to [statamount]% of your Mechanical skill.\nWhenever you deconstruct scrap, gain a bonus of [skillamount] to Mechanical.
infotexts.talentdescription.mechanicalmelee: Gain an additional percentage to Melee Power and Maximum Health equal to [statamount]% of your Mechanical skill.
infotexts.talentdescription.minerold: Whenever you deconstruct an ore, you have a [probability]% chance to gain double the output.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.fabricatorandde: You can tinker with a fabricator or a deconstructor, increases their operating rate by [speedincrease]%.\nYou can tinker with fabricators and deconstructors indefinitely.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.pumpold: You can tinker with a pump, increasing its pumping rate by [speedincrease]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.engineold: You can tinker with an engine, increasing its torque by [speedincrease]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.loaderold: You can tinker with a loader, increasing the connected turret's firing rate and damage by [damageincrease]%, while lowering its power usage by [powercostreduction]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.tutorialold: You can use a wrench to tinker with devices.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.cooldownreducti: The cooldown period of tinkering is reduced to [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.durationincreas: You can tinker for an additional [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.suppliespowerol: Non-turret devices you tinker with will always function as if they had power.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.reminderold: The device is only affected for as long as you keep tinkering with it.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.durationold: You can tinker for [duration] seconds. After you have tinkered with a device, you cannot tinker for [cooldown] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.overclockingold: Tinkering with items damages them, but the effects of tinkering are increased by [tinkerincrease]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.safetyprecautio: Tinkering with items repairs them, and you can tinker for additional [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.fieldmedicold: Every [seconds] seconds, if your allied crewmembers are at [healththreshold]% health or higher, gain [skillincrease] point in Medical skill.
infotexts.talentdescription.curiosityold: Whenever you deconstruct an alien artifact you gain [experiencegain] experience, and your crew gains [crewexperiencegain] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.reverseengineerold: Whenever you deconstruct an alien artifact, gain double output from it and gain [skillgain] to a random skill.
infotexts.talentdescription.alienhoarderold: Your attacks with alien pistols have [powerincrease]% additional power for each alien artifact you are carrying, up to an additional [maxpowerincrease]% power.
infotexts.talentdescription.doubledutyold: As long as you are outside your sub, take [physicaldamagedecrease]% less physical damage. As long as you are inside your submarine, gain a bonus of [skillincrease] to Medicine.
infotexts.talentdescription.firemanscarryold: You can drag characters at full speed.
infotexts.talentdescription.researchersintuitionol: Whenever you open an alien container for the first time, you have a [probability]% chance of finding additional items.\nWhile you are holding a large alien artifact, gain an additional [swimmingspeed]% Swimming Speed.
infotexts.talentdescription.commanderold: Whenever you give an order to another character, apply Inspiration to that character, giving them [physicalresistance]% physical damage resistance and a bonus of [skillincrease] to all skills.
infotexts.talentdescription.commanderreminderold: Giving an order to a new character removes the effect from the last character.
infotexts.talentdescription.additionalinspirationb: In addition to other Inspiration bonuses, the ordered character also gains the following attributes:
infotexts.talentdescription.allhandsondeckold: You may bestow an additional character with Inspiration effects.
infotexts.talentdescription.atmosmachineold: When you deconstruct an alien artifact, there is a [probability]% chance it will instead transform into a random alien item.\nWhenever you finish a mission, your crew gains [experienceamount]% additional mission experience for each large alien artifact on board your ship, up to [maxexperienceamount]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.navydiverold: Attacks you suffer are [attackpowerreduction]% less powerful while you are in water.
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualityrepair: Welding tools and plasma cutters you fabricate are [qualitybonus] higher quality.
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualityweapon: Weapons you fabricate are of [qualitybonus] higher quality.
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualitybatter: ‖color:gui.orange‖Battery Cells‖end‖ you fabricate are of [qualitybonus] higher quality.
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualityfuelro: Fuel rods you fabricate are of [qualitybonus] higher quality.
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualitytoolso: Tools you fabricate are of [qualitybonus] higher quality.
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualitytankso: Fuel and oxygen tanks you fabricate are of [qualitybonus] higher quality.
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualityexplos: Explosives you fabricate are of [qualitybonus] higher quality.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainitemsonmissionold: Whenever you finish at least one mission, gain the following items as an additional reward:
infotexts.talentdescription.extramissionold: You may select an additional mission.
infotexts.talentdescription.lowhealth.effectivehea: When you are below [health]% health, normal damage types are healed [extraheal]% more effectively.
infotexts.talentdescription.lowhealth.regenerateol: When you are below [health]% health, normal damage types slowly heal by themselves.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainstructurerepairspe: Repair hulls [amount]% faster with welding tools.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainstructurecutterdam: Deal [amount]% more damage to structures with cutters.
infotexts.talentdescription.findadditionalscrapold: Whenever you open a container in a wreck for the first time, you have a [probability]% chance of finding an additional scrap.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainmarksonskillpointo: Gain [amount] marks when you gain a skill point.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainskillspastmaxold: You can gain skills past their ordinary maximum.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainbonustoallskillsol: Gain a bonus of [amount] to all skills.
infotexts.talentdescription.reductiontoallskillsol: Suffer a reduction of [amount] to all skills.
infotexts.talentdescription.increasemaxrepairmecha: You can repair mechanical devices [percentage]% past their normal maximum condition.
infotexts.talentdescription.geneticmaterialrefineb: Refining genetic materials improves their potency by [amount]% more.
infotexts.talentdescription.geneticmaterialtainted: Combining different types of genetic materials is [amount]% less likely to taint the materials.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainmissionxpanditemol: Whenever you finish a mission without a crewmember dying, you gain the item [item].
infotexts.talentdescription.depletedfueldeconstruc: Whenever you or another allied crewmember deconstructs depleted fuel, they gain [amount] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.gaindoubleskillatskill: As long as your [skillname1] skill is [skilltotal] or higher, they gain twice as much [skillname2] skill.
infotexts.talentdescription.nobodyimportantdiesold: Gain [xpbonus]% bonus XP when completing a mission, if all crewmembers survived.
infotexts.entitydescription.advscrewdriver: A screwdriver with an attached electrical monitor. Makes electrical repairs and rewiring possible.
infotexts.entitydescription.advwrench: A wrench with an attached electrical monitor. Makes mechanical repair possible.
infotexts.entitydescription.advweldingtool: A welding tool with an attached status monitor. One of the most crucial tools on board the submarine. Also works underwater.
infotexts.entitydescription.advwrenchdementonite: A wrench with an attached electrical monitor.\nFabricated from the poorly understood alien material dementonite.\nHolding it evokes a strange sense of unease.
infotexts.entitydescription.advscrewdriverdementon: A screwdriver with an attached electrical monitor.\nFabricated from the poorly understood alien material dementonite.\nHolding it evokes a strange sense of unease.
infotexts.entitydescription.advwrenchhardened: A wrench that has gone through a process of hardening using depleted fuel. The strengthed material allows for more efficient repairs and heavier swings. It has an attached electrical monitor.
infotexts.entitydescription.advscrewdriverhardened: A screwdriver that has gone through a process of hardening using depleted fuel. The strengthed material allows for more efficient repairs and heavier swings. It has an attached electrical monitor.
infotexts.entitydescription.advheavywrench: A large and heavy titanium wrench with an attached electrical monitor. Can only be properly swung by very burly mechanics.
infotexts.entitydescription.radsscooter: Radiation-Assisted Delivery System, or RADS is a cargo scooter that is powered by fuel rods. It's the same speed as a normal cargo scooter but has more storage for items. Be warned though, as any volatile fuel rods that emit radiation are not shielded by this.
